# Prompts Used For Results

## 1: Profiling, No Reasoning

#### Was used

```Python
USER ="Attached is an image that consists of two sub-images. The top of the given image displays "\
    "the original image of a bird and the bottom displays the same image combined with a heatmap "\
    "that was generated by an explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) model to predict the species. "\
    "The more intense the red, the more this part of the image indicates the class prediction. "\
    "You think the model distinguishes the four possible species classes based on the following "\
    "features:\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_RA\n"\
    "- Least Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_LA\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_PA\n"\
    "- Crested Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_CA\n"\
    "Based on these descriptions, what bird species do you think did the XAI model predict for the image? "\
    "Choose one of the following options:\n"\
    "- Crested Auklet\n"\
    "- Least Auklet\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklet\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklet\n"\
    "Answer with the bird name only."
```

#### Should have been used

```Python
USER ="Attached is an image that consists of two sub-images. The top of the given image displays "\
    "the original image of a bird and the bottom displays the same image combined with a heatmap "\
    "that was generated by an explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) model to predict the species. "\
    "The more intense the red, the more this part of the image indicates the class prediction. "\
    "You think the model distinguishes the four possible species classes based on the following "\
    "features:\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_RA\n"\
    "- Least Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_LA\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_PA\n"\
    "- Crested Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_CA\n"\
    "Based on these descriptions, what bird species do you think was predicted for the image? "\
    "Choose one of the following options:\n"\
    "- Crested Auklet\n"\
    "- Least Auklet\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklet\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklet\n"\
    "Answer with the bird name only."
```

## 2: Profiling, Reasoning

```Python
USER ="Attached is an image that consists of two sub-images. The top of the given image displays "\
    "the original image of a bird and the bottom displays the same image combined with a heatmap "\
    "that was generated by an explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) model to predict the species. "\
    "You think the model distinguishes the four possible species classes based on the following "\
    "features if they are highlighted red by the heatmap:\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_RA\n"\
    "- Least Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_LA\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_PA\n"\
    "- Crested Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_CA\n"\
    "Based on the descriptions and the areas highlighted by the heatmap, what bird species do you "\
    "think was predicted for the given image?"\
    "For your answer, choose one of the following options:\n"\
    "- Crested Auklet\n"\
    "- Least Auklet\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklet\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklet\n"\
    "For each description explain why it could be this bird species or why not. Conclude your answer "\
    "by stating only the chosen option in the last line of your response. Keep the token limit low."  
```

## 2: Profiling, Reasoning

```Python
USER ="Attached is an image that consists of two sub-images. The top of the given image displays "\
    "the original image of a bird and the bottom displays the same image combined with a heatmap "\
    "that was generated by an explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) model to predict the species. "\
    "You think the model distinguishes the four possible species classes based on the following "\
    "features if they are highlighted red by the heatmap:\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_RA\n"\
    "- Least Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_LA\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_PA\n"\
    "- Crested Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_CA\n"\
    "Based on the descriptions and the areas highlighted by the heatmap, what bird species do you "\
    "think was predicted for the given image?"\
    "For your answer, choose one of the following options:\n"\
    "- Crested Auklet\n"\
    "- Least Auklet\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklet\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklet\n"\
    "First describe what areas of the bird are highlighted as important by the heatmap. Then, "\
    "explain for each given description why it could be this bird species or why not. Conclude your answer "\
    "by stating only the chosen option in the last line of your response. Keep the token limit low."  
```

("First describe what areas of the bird are highlighted red by the heatmap. Then, "\)


## 3: Profiling, Reasoning (b)
```Python
USER ="Attached is an image that consists of two sub-images. The top of the given image displays "\
    "the original image of a bird and the bottom displays the same image combined with a heatmap "\
    "that was generated by an explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) model to predict the species. "\
    "You think the model distinguishes the four possible species classes based on the following "\
    "features if they are highlighted red by the heatmap:\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_RA\n"\
    "- Least Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_LA\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_PA\n"\
    "- Crested Auklets: HEATMAP_FEATURES_CA\n"\
    "Based on the descriptions and the areas highlighted by the heatmap, what bird species do you "\
    "think was predicted for the given image?"\
    "For your answer, choose one of the following options:\n"\
    "- Rhinoceros Auklet\n"\
    "- Least Auklet\n"\
    "- Parakeet Auklet\n"\
    "- Crested Auklet\n"\
    "First describe all areas of the bird that are highlighted by the heatmap. Finally, "\
    "explain for each given bird description why it could be this bird species or why not. Conclude your answer "\
    "by stating only the chosen option in the last line of your response. Keep the token limit low."    
```
